title: Hire Define Value
body:
The core contributors team is seeking DAO approval to pay Define Value to fully deploy the new single sided pools. Define Value must create the solidity logic and also fully integrate it within the current Yapeswap interface using typescript.

The team is asking for approval of up to $3k, as Define Value will be given offered other tasks, mostly maintenance related, to perform should the first task go according to plan.

The forum post is available below.
https://forum.yape.exchange/t/funding-for-single-sided-liquidity-pairs/44/6
author: 0x77FA39F3aDf09BDE9D4F175E40D0854D21a33318
